segments.text: What are your strengths and weaknesses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have just left school , but I am well acquainted with office work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you qualified for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since leaving school , I have attended typewriting and shorthand classes , and have now attained a speed of fifty and ninety works respectively .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can you contribute to the position of a market analyst ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know how to gather and summarize information from the Intent , which is an essential skill for market analysis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What job-related skills do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a good accountant and have a thorough knowledge of the English language .
segments.speaker: S2
